title: William Morris Persia Pattern Mug
description:
William Morris had a close association with the South Kensington Museum (Victoria and Albert) and took a deep interest in their developing collection of objects from the Middle East. The Persia pattern was inspired by works the museum acquired from Iran in 1884.

  • Size: 11 ounces
  • Dimensions: 3.75 in. tall 3.25 in. diameter
  • Material: Ceramic
  • Microwave safe
